title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder
summary: Super Mario Bros. Wonder features Princess Peach, Princess Daisy and Yoshi as playable characters in this new 2D, co-op platformer, in addition to familiar characters like Mario, Luigi and Toad.

title: Omori
summary: Explore a strange world full of colorful friends and foes. When the time comes, the path you’ve chosen will determine your fate... and perhaps the fate of others as well.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom
summary: It’s up to Zelda and her wisdom to save the kingdom of Hyrule in a brand-new story in The Legend of Zelda series. The people of Hyrule are being stolen away by strange rifts that have appeared, with a certain swordsman among the missing. Team up with the mysterious fairy, Tri, and use the power of the Tri Rod to create echoes – imitations of things found in the environment

title: Mario & Luigi: Brothership
summary: All aboard for an island-hopping RPG adventure starring Mario and Luigi! The brothers are back for a brand-new entry in the Mario & Luigi series, where they set sail on Shipshape Island (part ship, part island) to navigate the vast world of Concordia.

title: Banjo and Kazooie
summary: You are Banjo, a honey bear on the hunt for your kidnapped sister, Tooty in Rare''s colorful 3D platformer. By your side -- or actually on your back -- is your trusty friend, the breegull Kazooie.
contentrating: Comic Mischief, Cartoon Violence, Mild Suggestive Themes

title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
summary: In three days, the moon will fall and the land of Termina will meet with a terrible fate. Can you save it in time? Relive the world’s final 72 hours, solve elaborate puzzles, conquer dungeons, battle giant bosses, and befriend the doomed people of Termina in one of Nintendo’s most suspenseful apocalyptic adventures ever.

title: Kingdom Hearts II
summary: A darkly-cloaked Mickey Mouse joins Donald, Goofy, and Sora as they continue their adventure into several popular Disney-inspired action/RPG worlds.
contentrating: Violence, Mild Blood, Use of Alcohol

title: Undertale
summary: UNDERTALE! The RPG game where you don''t have to destroy anyone.
contentrating: Mild Language, Fantasy Violence, Simulated Gambling, Mild Blood, Use of Tobacco
